divs: Sighting Detailslooked out of back window, saw a flash, it came back, golden with a black center. it was gone. then I thought i went to the front of the house, looked out and there it was again. this time golden, with black, I saw windows in it, then it went behind trees. I had been up walking the floors. Having hard time sleeping.The object moved fast behind trees.I knew it was over, so I went to bed.
Summary: looked out back window, saw a flash, it came back,gold. with a black cylinderl. looked out front then it waw there.
